title: cogo
description:
Simply create a group trip and invite your friends.

Trip members can then propose and vote on potential destinations and accommodation.

When ready, trip organisers can create a virtual cogopay card to be used for group payments. No more awkwardly splitting bills.
responsibilities: Designed cogo's branding using Adobe CC
Created lo-res and high-res wireframes using Figma
Drove front-end development in a team of 3 developers
Initiated daily stand-ups with Jira to maintain team alignment in an agile environment
Reduced load time by 75% with optimistic rendering as well as meaningful loading UI with React Suspense and skeletons
Implemented comprehensive end-to-end tests using Cypress to ensure the stability and reliability of the application across different scenarios

title: subtrackd

Understand your spending at a glance.

Stay ahead with timely payment reminders.

title: Reciplease
tagline: Your favourite recipes, all in one convenient place
description:
We've all encountered the frustration of having recipes scattered across websites, cookbooks, magazines and handwritten notes.

Reciplease aims to solve this problem by providing a central hub for all of your recipes, regardless of their origin.

Users can easily organise, access, and personalise their favourite culinary creations, all in one convenient place.
responsibilities: Designed Reciplease's branding using Adobe CC
Created lo-res and high-res wireframes using Figma
Implemented a user-friendly front-end and a robust back-end
Delivered a high-quality and reliable app on strict deadlines
